sentences.sContent: Nigel coaches a cricket team in his spare time.
sentences.sCn: 奈杰尔业余时间担任一个板球队的教练。

sentences.sContent: He gently coached me in French.
sentences.sCn: 他为我补习法语，态度十分温和。

sentences.sContent: ...which provide a volunteer coach and pay a nominal fee to send students to regional and state competitions...
...the head coach of last year’s winning U...
...We do not doubt that teachers who also coach face serious tradeoffs that likely come at the expense of time they could dedicate to their academic obligations...
...even in the cases where the employee is a teacher first and athletic coach second...

synos.tran: 教练；旅客车厢；[车辆]长途公车；四轮大马车

trans.tranOther: to teach a person or team the skills they need for a sport
